this_title: Andrew Packer: On Guard Andrew Pac
introduction: Uproarious stories about mountain hikes, relationships, the inevitable grip of death, and the enigmatic world of house towels. This comedy special showcases Andrew Packer's signature observational humor, razor-sharp wit, and features unexpected cameos that make this comedy set truly 'special'! Packer does an exceptional job tipping his hat to his home country, while masterfully dissecting how Canadians truly are versus how they are perceived on the global stage.
chinese_title: Andrew Packer: On Guard Andrew Pac
